scripts.build-api-docs: rm -rf api-docs.tmp && mkdir -p api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cp -r docs/api-docs api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml && raml2html api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml > api-docs.tmp/docs/index.html
scripts.validate-api-docs: rm -rf api-docs.tmp && mkdir -p api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cp -r docs/api-docs api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml && raml-validate api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml
scripts.prepare-demo: cd ../.. && rm -rf demo/demo-fs && cd demo && sh ./populate-demo-fs.sh && cd ../packages/server-nodejs
scripts.test-rest: npm run prepare-demo && npm run test-restapi
